channel.title: writing on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in writing on Barefoot Rob

item.title: work The Pin travel
item.description: 30 September 1997 Today the president of the corporation that owns my company is coming to visit. They put up a big sign, hollerin’ a “Big Texas Howdy!” gag me. I showed off my project to Leila, who said it looked really good and she was quite pleased and impressed. Yay! She’s a manager or something over the group that will be using the application, so I was glad she liked it.
